name: Clockwork and Crossbones
blurb: Turn-based strategy game for Facebook and Kongregate.  Play as James Aleshire as he rescues his pirate crew from Doctor Driftwood.

rewards.reward: Exclusive wallpaper for your computer, access to the donators-only board in the upcoming Clockwork and Crossbones forum
"Ally of the Crew" achievement (they aren't just for show in this game!), 'Silver Spyglass' unique in-game item- provides a bonus to every kind of ship.

A high-quality print of your choice of Clockwork and Crossbones concept art.  Your name in the 'Special Thanks' section of the credits, 'Pyrite Ticket' in-game item- unlocks any one achievement.  Please Note: If you select the $150 or lower tier, you get EVERY LEVEL before it.  If you select a tier higher than $150, you get that tier, and all of the tiers $150 and lower.

More in-game content!  Silver Star Chart and Silver Astrolabe items- apart they give your ships more speed, combined with the Silver Spyglass gain the unparallelled power to move through other ships.  Also gain access to Archibald Onepenny, a captain who grants your entire fleet extra HP.

Excited for the upcoming plot behind Clockwork and Crossbones?  You'll get access to the Captain's Chair- a once-a-week newsletter written by the producer that will run until the game's launch.  In it you'll find behind the scenes info, art revealed before being released to the public, and plot information much more detailed than what we give the rest of the fans.
You get a Clockwork and Crossbones T-Shirt!  It has our logo on the back and the Mechanical Kraken on the front.

Custom art of anything you want (within reason- no sexual content or excessive violence) done by the talented Spark Brilliance art team.  Our characters, your characters, someone else's characters done in our style- the possibilities are endless!  You can even request an artist if there's a member whose work you particularly enjoy.

The T-Shirt above, signed by the entire Spark Brilliance development team.  Please note- this Replaces the above T-Shirt.  If you pledge this amount or higher you get one shirt, signed, not two and one of them signed.

SWABBIE: Want to be part of the creative process?  The named tiers let you do just that.  Each includes all rewards from the non-named tiers, but do NOT include previous named tiers.  The Swabbie Tier lets you work with us to design one item to go into the game.
CABIN BOY: You get to work with us to design one item to go into the game AND you or your original character will have a minor role (1 episode) in the game.
CHEF: Pick any two: Design an Item, Design an Item Set (3 items), You or Your Character get a Minor Role, or Design an Island the Heroes go to.
PIRATE: You or your original character get a medium role in the game (at least 4 episodes).  Pick any one reward from the Chef Tier.
BOS'N: You get to write the plot for a 4-episode storyline that everyone will be able to play.  Pick any one reward from the Chef or Pirate Tiers.
QUARTERMASTER: Invitation to the Launch Party for Clockwork and Crossbones in Austin, Texas (airfare, etc. not included) as well as any one reward from the Chef, Pirate, or Bos'n tiers.
GUNNER: Invitation to the Launch Party, any two rewards from the Chef, Pirate, or Bos'n tiers.
FIRST MATE: Invitation to the Launch Party and EITHER you or your original character get a major role in the game (at least 8 episodes) OR three rewards from the Chef, Pirate, or Bos'n tiers

CAPTAIN: The same as First Mate, but with one important addition.  You get a Producer credit, and we take that seriously and literally.  You will sign an NDA and have access to company mailing lists, meetings, and all our progress.  You will have a direct say in what direction this game goes.  This is the only limited availability reward, for obvious reasons.
